title: Taekwondo Training-Competition Behavior Analysis-based Practical Drill Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Taekwondo techniques and understanding of competition rules
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating systematic analytical skills by leveraging learners' professional domain experiences (medical/legal/technical).

learning_goals: Learners can design representative practice scenarios similar to actual competitions in training environments
Learners can conduct an integrated analysis of physical actions (offense/defense) and psychological factors (concentration/anxiety) occurring during taekwondo competitions
Learners can quantitatively evaluate behavioral pattern differences between training and competitions using digital tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
